h2_title: Where to Use the Buddha's Eyeball in Black Myth: Wukong
content: You can actually spawn Shigandang alongside the Stone Vanguard and have them fight each other to knock out two birds with one stone. But, you can also fight them individually.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Buddha's_Eyeball_Locations.md', within the main section titled 'Buddha's Eyeball Locations', specifically from the subsection 'Where to Use the Buddha's Eyeball in Black Myth: Wukong'.
The content is as follows:
You can actually spawn Shigandang alongside the Stone Vanguard and have them fight each other to knock out two birds with one stone. But, you can also fight them individually.
